entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 60%
